1. Intercepts
2. Turning point
3. Axis of symmetry
4. Domain and range
5. Maximum and minimum values

en.latex:
Sketch the graphs of \( f(x) = \frac{a}{x+p} \) and \( a(x) = mx + c \) on the same set of axis. Use the following information to help you:

\bullet p > 0 \\&
\bullet q < 0 \\&
\bullet c = q \\&
\bullet m < 0 \end{align} \)

en.latex: Determine the values of \( a \) and \( b \) .
en.html: Determine the values of \( a \) and \( b \) .

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} &y = ax + b \\&
y = ax - 4 \\&
0 = a(4) - 4 \\&
4 = 4a \\&
a = 1 \\&
\\&
\therefore a = 1 \text{ and } b=-4 \end{align} \)
en.html:
\( \begin{align} &y = ax + b \\&
y = ax - 4 \\&
0 = a(4) - 4 \\&
4 = 4a \\&
a = 1 \\&
\\&
\therefore a = 1 \text{ and } b=-4 \end{align} \)

\end{array} \)

x=0 &\text{ or } x=-4 \end{align}
